    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public boolean copy(Path file,
                    Storage server)
        Checks that a proper request to copy the file has been received.

        Neither of the arguments may be null. The path to the file to be copied must be the path expected, and the storage server from which to copy the file must be other storage server in the test. There must not be duplicate requests to copy the file. If any of these conditions is violated, the test fails.

        Specified by:
        copy in interface Command
        Overrides:
        copy in class TestStorageServer
        Parameters:
        file - Path to the file to be copied.
        server - Stub for the storage server from which to copy the file.
        Returns:
        true if the file is successfully copied; false otherwise.
